metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3085 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 26.0.0.137 and earlier have a security bypass vulnerability that leads to information disclosure when performing URL redirect.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.151ubuntu0.16.04.1').
